professional_summary: Over five years of experience in database management systems administration, expert at developing and maintaining databases with a strong background in high-end servers. Seeking a fulfilling, proactive career assuming increasing responsibilities.

key_responsibilities: provided DB tools for transaction processing environments
coordinated with developers and project managers
Technical Support: Monitored system performance for problem resolution
provided SQL database support by overseeing development and organization
communicated regularly with staff for information flow
Maintenance: Monitored data availability for faster query response
designed conceptual schema according to client needs
ensured data security from external threats
tested and installed latest DBMS versions
